definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[חעף]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. d.a9ufa III. make double, d.i9fun double; Eth. s’anafa: fold, double, so Aram. [[עוּף]], 90p,0a9iyp double (for 9a9iyp = [[חָעִיף]]), cf. Targum [[עֵיפָא]] for Heb. [[חָעִיף]] (prop. a double or folded thing); v. esp. Lag:sem.i.23.ff.).
